document.full_text: despite age restrictions on some social media sites, the number of u.s. parents who would allow children 10-12 years old to have a facebook or myspace account has doubled in a year, a new survey showed.
document.title: more parents lenient about young web use: poll
lines_and_colors: despite age restrictions on some social media sites, the number of u.s. parents who would allow children 10-12 years old to have a facebook or myspace account has doubled in a year, a new survey showed.
